medical_summary.Summary: Physician: Are you able to do the physical therapy exercises How's the pain level

Subjective.History_of_Present_Illness: Patient history details provided in conversation

Objective.Physical_Exam: Based on patient description - detailed physical exam not recorded
Objective.Observations: Patient appears coherent and responsive based on dialogue

Plan.Follow_Up: Follow up as needed based on symptom progression
Medications: Analgesics as needed for pain management

patient_text: * Much better than last week, thank you. The swelling has gone down quite a bit. * It's manageable with the medication. About a 3 out of 10 most of the time. * Yes, I'm doing them twice a day as instructed. They're challenging but getting easier.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Physician
dialogue_turns.text: * Welcome back. How are you recovering from the knee surgery?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Patient
dialogue_turns.text: * Much better than last week, thank you. The swelling has gone down quite a bit.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Physician
dialogue_turns.text: * That's good to hear. How's the pain level?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Patient
dialogue_turns.text: * It's manageable with the medication. About a 3 out of 10 most of the time.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Physician
dialogue_turns.text: * Are you able to do the physical therapy exercises?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Patient
dialogue_turns.text: * Yes, I'm doing them twice a day as instructed. They're challenging but getting easier.
